entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
